name: DFIntCombatOptimizationLevel
exploit_description: Higher values (3-5) improve hit registration and reduce combat lag. Particularly effective in PvP games.

name: FFlagBypassAnticheat
exploit_description: Can potentially bypass some anticheat measures. Use with caution as it may trigger server-side detection.

name: DFIntPlayerNetworkStates
exploit_description: Values above 120 can give significant advantage in combat by improving hit registration and reducing desync

name: FFlagDisableAnimationStateReplication
exploit_description: Can make your animations invisible to other players while maintaining hitboxes

name: DFIntHitboxExpansionSize
exploit_description: Positive values increase effective hitbox size. Very effective in shooting games.

name: FFlagDisableCharacterStateFilter
exploit_description: Can allow movement in normally restricted states (e.g., during stuns or animations)

name: DFIntProjectileSimulationMode
exploit_description: Higher values (2-3) can improve projectile accuracy and reduce server-side validation

name: FFlagEnableClientPhysics
exploit_description: Can give more control over character movement and reduce rubber-banding

name: DFIntNetworkOwnershipCacheSize
exploit_description: Larger values (256-512) can improve interaction with distant objects and reduce ownership checks

name: FFlagDisableCollisionFiltering
exploit_description: Can allow passing through certain types of collision barriers

name: DFIntRenderDistance
exploit_description: Very high values (5000+) can reveal players and objects beyond normal view distance

name: FFlagBypassTerrainChecks
exploit_description: Can allow seeing and sometimes interacting through terrain

name: DFIntProjectilePenetration
exploit_description: Higher values allow projectiles to pass through multiple targets

name: FFlagDisableServerValidation
exploit_description: Can bypass certain server-side checks for position and state

name: DFIntCriticalHitMultiplier
exploit_description: Values above 150 can significantly increase damage output in some games
